line.comment: * PIRACY: LOGIC LIBRARY -by- MISTER BEAR v1.45 Jan-2011
* DESCRIPTION: Functions for manipulating / interrogating game objects
* ALERT NEAREST POLICE VESSEL : Finds the nearest military/police vessel to a ship and orders them to attack it.
* ARGUMENT 1 : [ship] Criminal vessel police ought to target
* RETURN VALUE : [ship] Alerted vessel or NULL
* FIND ALL SHIPS IN THE SECTOR
* Sort police vessels into distance order and alert the first valid vessel in the array.
* Store local variable on ship showing the time it was alerted
* Alert and return pointer to alerted ship
* ...Fall through...Returns null if no police vessel found
* CLASSIFY VESSEL : Determine whether a vessel is of a specified classification
* ARGUMENT 2 : [bool] Exclude Pirates, Yaki, Khaak, Xenon, Player and Unclaimed ships
* Corporate Military, Corporate Freighters and Corporate Escorts (Ignored)
* SPECIAL CASE: Military Supply Transporter (Page 30-1000, id 30009)
* Police, Military, Border patrol and Customs
* SPECIAL CASE: Odd freighter, hireable TLs and odd passenger shuttles
* GET POLICE VESSEL COUNT : Retrieves the number of 'unalerted' police vessels in a sector
* FIND ALL SHIPS IN THE SECTOR
* GET PLAYER RANK : Get player rank index
* ARGUMENT 1 : [race] Race to get rank index of
* Check if threshold reached + adjust index to match tooltips
* GET SHIP CARGO : Retrieve either an array of wares carried as goods aboard a ship, or their total value
* ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Options: 1: Retrieve 'goods' cargo array 2: Retrieve total value of 'goods' cargo array
* RETURN VALUE : [array] Array of ships cargo in the following format: Ware 1, Amount 1, ..., Ware n, Amount n
* : OR [int] Net value of ships cargo
* Calculate value and increase running total
* Return goods array or running total
* GET SHIP WEAPONS ARRAY : Retrieve a list of weapon/shield wares INSTALLED on a ship
* ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Bit mask indicating which weapon types to be excluded from list
* RETURN VALUE : [array][ware] Array of installed wares
* exclude wares based on their main type if relevant bit-flags are present
* IS SHIP ALERTED : Determines the ship has already been alerted (within the last 4 minutes)
* DEBUG PRINT SHIP : print debugging info

sval.val: PIRACY: LOGIC LIBRARY -by- MISTER BEAR v1.45 Jan-2011
DESCRIPTION: Functions for manipulating / interrogating game objects
ALERT NEAREST POLICE VESSEL : Finds the nearest military/police vessel to a ship and orders them to attack it.
ARGUMENT 1 : [ship] Criminal vessel police ought to target
RETURN VALUE : [ship] Alerted vessel or NULL
FIND ALL SHIPS IN THE SECTOR
Sort police vessels into distance order and alert the first valid vessel in the array.
Store local variable on ship showing the time it was alerted
Alert and return pointer to alerted ship
...Fall through...Returns null if no police vessel found
CLASSIFY VESSEL : Determine whether a vessel is of a specified classification
ARGUMENT 2 : [bool] Exclude Pirates, Yaki, Khaak, Xenon, Player and Unclaimed ships
Corporate Military, Corporate Freighters and Corporate Escorts (Ignored)
SPECIAL CASE: Military Supply Transporter (Page 30-1000, id 30009)
Police, Military, Border patrol and Customs
SPECIAL CASE: Odd freighter, hireable TLs and odd passenger shuttles
GET POLICE VESSEL COUNT : Retrieves the number of 'unalerted' police vessels in a sector
FIND ALL SHIPS IN THE SECTOR
GET PLAYER RANK : Get player rank index
ARGUMENT 1 : [race] Race to get rank index of
Check if threshold reached + adjust index to match tooltips
GET SHIP CARGO : Retrieve either an array of wares carried as goods aboard a ship, or their total value
ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Options: 1: Retrieve 'goods' cargo array 2: Retrieve total value of 'goods' cargo array
RETURN VALUE : [array] Array of ships cargo in the following format: Ware 1, Amount 1, ..., Ware n, Amount n
: OR [int] Net value of ships cargo
Calculate value and increase running total
Return goods array or running total
GET SHIP WEAPONS ARRAY : Retrieve a list of weapon/shield wares INSTALLED on a ship
ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Bit mask indicating which weapon types to be excluded from list
RETURN VALUE : [array][ware] Array of installed wares
exclude wares based on their main type if relevant bit-flags are present
IS SHIP ALERTED : Determines the ship has already been alerted (within the last 4 minutes)
DEBUG PRINT SHIP : print debugging info
